environmentVariables.description: [rembg.local] absolute path of the installed rembg cli
environmentVariables.name: MT_REMBG_PATH

environmentVariables.name: MT_REMBG_URL

environmentVariables.name: MT_COMFY_URL

environmentVariables.name: MT_COMFY_WORKFLOW_T2I

environmentVariables.name: MT_COMFY_WORKFLOW_I2I

environmentVariables.description: [Image.local.ComfyUi] Optional: Variable values to send to the workflow via comfyUI API
environmentVariables.name: MT_COMFY_PARAMS

environmentVariables.description: [Image] Optional: Fixed avatar generation prompt. You will no longer be able to change your avatar during conversations.
environmentVariables.name: MT_FIXED_MODEL_PROMPT

environmentVariables.name: MT_BODY_AREA_RATIO

environmentVariables.description: [Image] Optional: Acceptable avatar image aspect ratios. default 1.5~2.3
environmentVariables.name: MT_BODY_HW_RATIO

environmentVariables.description: [Image] Optional: Avatar composite window horizontal ratio. default 0.5
environmentVariables.name: MT_BODY_WINDOW_RATIO_W

environmentVariables.description: [Image] Optional: Avatar composite window aspect ratio. default 0.75
environmentVariables.name: MT_BODY_WINDOW_RATIO_H

environmentVariables.description: [Sns.Bs] Bluesky sns registration address

environmentVariables.name: MT_BS_HANDLE

environmentVariables.description: [etc] Optional: Directly filter the tools to be used. All are available if not specified. e.g. tips,set_traveler_location
environmentVariables.name: MT_FILTER_TOOLS

environmentVariables.description: [etc] Option: Specify whether the movement mode is 'realtime' or 'skip'. default realtime
environmentVariables.name: MT_MOVE_MODE

environmentVariables.description: [Image] Option: Output image width (pixels) Default is 512
environmentVariables.name: MT_IMAGE_WIDTH

environmentVariables.description: [Image] Options: 'true' = do not output image, not specified = output image if possible, default is not specified

environmentVariables.description: [Image] Option: 'true' = Output StreetView image as is without avatar superimposition. Not specified = Superimpose avatar image. Default is not specified.

environmentVariables.description: [Sns] Optional: Specify the feed tag when posting to SNS (#required, 15 characters or more) Default is #geo_less_traveler

environmentVariables.name: MT_SESSION_TTL_MS

environmentVariables.description: [Streamable-http] Service TTL when using Streamable-http

packageArguments.name: --exportTimeoutMs

packageArguments.description: Host address to bind the HTTP server to (only used when transport is 'http').
packageArguments.name: --httpHost

packageArguments.description: Port number for the HTTP server (only used when transport is 'http').
packageArguments.name: --httpPort

packageArguments.description: Idle timeout for a client to disconnect (only applies to http transport).

packageArguments.description: When set to true, enforces that query operations must use an index, rejecting queries that perform a collection scan.

packageArguments.name: --logPath

packageArguments.description: Comma separated values, possible values are 'mcp', 'disk' and 'stderr'.
packageArguments.name: --loggers

packageArguments.description: The maximum size in bytes for results from a find or aggregate tool call. This serves as an upper bound for the responseBytesLimit parameter in those tools.
packageArguments.name: --maxBytesPerQuery

packageArguments.description: Notification timeout for a client to be aware of disconnect (only applies to http transport).
packageArguments.name: --notificationTimeoutMs

packageArguments.description: When set to true, only allows read, connect, and metadata operation types, disabling create/update/delete operations.
packageArguments.name: --readOnly

packageArguments.description: When set to disabled, disables telemetry collection.
packageArguments.name: --telemetry

packageArguments.name: --transport

server.description: Enables natural language schema queries — explore tables, keys, procedures, and get SQL help fast

environmentVariables.description: MCP Server transport type - valid values are 'http' or 'stdio', defaulting to 'stdio'.
environmentVariables.name: SCHCRWLR_MCP_SERVER_TRANSPORT

environmentVariables.description: Database user name. Can be optional depending on the database connection type.
environmentVariables.name: SCHCRWLR_DATABASE_USER

environmentVariables.description: Database user password. Can be optional depending on the database connection type.
environmentVariables.name: SCHCRWLR_DATABASE_PASSWORD

environmentVariables.description: JDBC URL for database connection. If this is provided, the server, host, port and database are not used.
environmentVariables.name: SCHCRWLR_JDBC_URL

environmentVariables.description: SchemaCrawler database plugin, for example, 'sqlserver' or 'sqlite'. Used only if the JDBC URL is not provided.
environmentVariables.name: SCHCRWLR_SERVER

environmentVariables.description: Database host. Defaults to localhost. Used only if the JDBC URL is not provided.
environmentVariables.name: SCHCRWLR_HOST

environmentVariables.description: Database port. Defaults to the default port for the server type. Used only if the JDBC URL is not provided.
environmentVariables.name: SCHCRWLR_PORT

environmentVariables.description: Database to connect to (optional). Used only if the JDBC URL is not provided.
environmentVariables.name: SCHCRWLR_DATABASE

environmentVariables.description: How much database metadata to retrieve. Values are 'minimum', 'standard', 'detailed' or 'maximum'.
environmentVariables.name: SCHCRWLR_INFO_LEVEL

environmentVariables.description: Logging verbosity level. Values are 'SEVERE', 'WARNING', 'INFO', 'CONFIG', or 'FINE'.
environmentVariables.name: SCHCRWLR_LOG_LEVEL
